ResourceHeader.Description:
Pitch-angle distributions (PADs) are given in particle flux units, as a function of the particle energy and pitch-angle (2D distributions), and their  resolution is in 16 angular sectors covering the pitch angle range from 0° to 180°.
            PADs are calculated for HIA magnetospheric modes. The  dataset  is  provided  with  31  energy  bins  resolution
